title: Such a shame
review: As a fan of the original I was expecting a lot but this seems to be a very forlorn homage; it tries too hard to be a cinematic success and yet mopes through the storyline which could easily have been an hour shorter.. and in an era of questions being raised over directors and their desires portrayed on film their are a couple of scenes which may raise concern. Harrison Ford and Ryan Gosling are the only redeeming factor of otherwise a boring meander through a bleak dystopia..
